meanings.definition: The act of representing something in a figure or design.
meanings.sent1: The figuration of the characters in the story was beautifully done.
meanings.sent2: The artist's painting displayed intricate figuration of nature.
meanings.sent3: The figuration of the clouds resembled fluffy cotton candy.
meanings.sent4: Her dance was a graceful figuration of elegance and poise.
meanings.sent5: The figuration of the map made it easy to understand the geography.

meanings.definition: The arrangement or organization of parts in a design or work of art.
meanings.sent1: The figuration of colors in the painting created a harmonious blend.
meanings.sent2: The figuration of shapes in the sculpture was truly captivating.
meanings.sent3: The figuration of the furniture in the room made it look cozy.
meanings.sent4: The figuration of words in the poem painted a vivid picture in the reader's mind.
meanings.sent5: The figuration of instruments in the orchestra produced a symphonic masterpiece.

meanings.definition: The act of shaping or forming something.
meanings.sent1: The potter's figuration of the clay into a vase was skillful.
meanings.sent2: The sculptor's figuration of the marble into a statue was impressive.
meanings.sent3: The chef's figuration of the dough into a perfect pie was mouth-watering.
meanings.sent4: The architect's figuration of the building was innovative and modern.
meanings.sent5: The gardener's figuration of the bushes into animal shapes added a playful touch to the garden.
